title: You Cannot Pass! (2U30)
text:
Set:	Mines of Moria
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Gandalf
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Event
Game Text:	Spell. Maneuver: Spot Gandalf bearing a staff to prevent a minion from being fierce until the regroup phase.
Lore:	“The Balrog fell back and its sword flew up in molten fragments. The wizard swayed on the bridge, stepped back a pace, and then again stood still.”
Rarity:	U
